title: For His Affection
description: Pam's exciting new relationship with the wealthy, powerful and beguiling Robert Foster takes her all the way from the bright lights of Manhattan to the romantic boulevards of Paris, the city of Pam's childhood dreams. Her dreams are shattered, however, with the arrival of a rival for Foster's heart, the beautiful and sexually adventurous Gabrielle Lucharde. As the French beauty's relationship with Robert is revealed it becomes clear to Pam that she must fight to keep hold of her man. But can she prove to Foster that she's the woman of his dreams? For His Affection is the fourth installment in the worldwide bestselling Dominated by the Billionaire series. At His Command, On His Orders and With His Consent are available now at Amazon and all good bookstores.
author: Aya Fukunishi
